# materials-badge



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                          | Description                       |
| ----------------------------- | --------------------------------- |
| `--materials-badge-color`     | The background color of the badge |
| `--materials-badge-ink-color` | The text color of the badge       |

### Used by

graph TD;
